short.ar: في لعبة الحركة هذه ، الهروب من السجن دون الوقوع في أيدي رجال الشرطة في مستويات صعبة.
short.am: በዚህ የድርጊት ጨዋታ ውስጥ በፖሊሶች በፈታኝ ደረጃ ሳይያዙ ከእስር ቤቱ አምልጡ።
short.bg: В тази екшън игра, Избягайте от затвора, без да бъдат хванати от ченгетата в предизвикателни нива.
short.bn: এই অ্যাকশন গেমে, চ্যালেঞ্জিং স্তরে পুলিশদের দ্বারা ধরা না পড়ে কারাগার থেকে পালিয়ে যান।
short.ca: En aquest joc d'acció, Escapa't de la presó sense ser atrapat pels policies en nivells difícils.
short.cs: V této akční hře, Útěk z vězení, aniž by byl chycen policajty v náročných úrovních.
short.da: I dette actionspil undslipper du fængslet uden at blive fanget af politiet i udfordrende niveauer.
short.de: In diesem Actionspiel entkomme ich dem Gefängnis, ohne in herausfordernden Levels von den Cops erwischt zu werden.
short.el: Σε αυτό το παιχνίδι δράσης, αποδράστε από τη φυλακή χωρίς να πιάσετε τους μπάτσους σε προκλητικά επίπεδα.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: In this action game, Escape the prison without getting caught by the cops in challenging levels.
short.es: En este juego de acción, escapa de la prisión sin ser atrapado por los policías en niveles desafiantes.
short.et: Selles põnevusmängus põgenege vanglast, ilma et politseinikud neid keerulistel tasanditel tabaksid.
short.fa: در این بازی اکشن، فرار از زندان بدون گرفتن توسط پلیس در سطوح چالش برانگیز گرفتار.
short.fi: Tässä toimintapelissä pakene vankilasta ilman, että poliisit jäävät kiinni haastavilla tasoilla.
short.fil: Sa aksyon na ito laro, Escape ang bilangguan nang walang pagkuha ng nahuli sa pamamagitan ng mga kopya sa mahirap na antas.
short.fr: Dans ce jeu d’action, évadez-vous de la prison sans vous faire attraper par les flics dans des niveaux difficiles.
short.gu: આ એક્શન ગેમમાં, પડકારજનક સ્તરોમાં પોલીસ દ્વારા પકડાયા વિના જેલમાંથી છટકી જાઓ.
short.he: במשחק פעולה זה, לברוח מהכלא מבלי להיתפס על ידי השוטרים ברמות מאתגרות.
short.hi: इस कार्रवाई खेल में, चुनौतीपूर्ण स्तरों में पुलिस द्वारा पकड़े बिना जेल से बचें।
short.hr: U ovoj akcijskoj igri, pobjegnite iz zatvora, a da vas policajci ne uhvate u izazovnim razinama.
short.hu: Ebben az akciójátékban szökj meg a börtönből anélkül, hogy a zsaruk kihívást jelentő szinteken elkapnák őket.
short.id: Dalam game aksi ini, Escape the prison tanpa ketahuan oleh polisi di level yang menantang.
short.it: In questo gioco d'azione, fuggi dalla prigione senza essere catturato dai poliziotti in livelli impegnativi.
short.ja: このアクションゲームでは、挑戦的なレベルで警官に捕まることなく刑務所を脱出します。
short.kn: ಈ ಆಕ್ಷನ್ ಆಟದಲ್ಲಿ, ಸವಾಲಿನ ಮಟ್ಟದಲ್ಲಿ ಪೊಲೀಸರ ಕೈಗೆ ಸಿಕ್ಕಿಹಾಕಿಕೊಳ್ಳದೆ ಜೈಲಿನಿಂದ ತಪ್ಪಿಸಿಕೊಳ್ಳಿ.
short.ko: 이 액션 게임에서, 도전적인 수준에서 경찰에 의해 잡히지 않고 감옥을 탈출.
short.lv: Šajā darbības spēlē izbēgiet no cietuma, neķeroties pie policistiem izaicinošā līmenī.
short.ml: ഈ ആക്ഷൻ ഗെയിമിൽ, വെല്ലുവിളി നിറഞ്ഞ തലങ്ങളിൽ പോലീസുകാരുടെ പിടിയിലാകാതെ ജയിലിൽ നിന്ന് രക്ഷപ്പെടുക.
short.mr: या अॅक्शन गेममध्ये आव्हानात्मक स्तरात पोलिसांच्या तावडीत न अडकता जेलमधून सुटका करून घ्या.
short.ms: Dalam permainan aksi ini, Escape penjara tanpa ditangkap oleh polis dalam tahap yang mencabar.
short.nl: In dit actiespel ontsnap je uit de gevangenis zonder betrapt te worden door de politie in uitdagende levels.
short.no: I dette actionspillet, Unnslippe fengselet uten å bli fanget av politiet i utfordrende nivåer.
short.pl: W tej grze akcji ucieknij z więzienia, nie dając się złapać przez na trudnych poziomach.
short.ro: În acest joc de acțiune, Scăpa de închisoare fără a fi prins de politisti in niveluri provocatoare.
short.ru: В этой экшен-игре сбегайте из тюрьмы, не будучи пойманным полицейскими на сложных уровнях.
short.sk: V tejto akčnej hre Utečte z väzenia bez toho, aby vás policajti chytili v náročných úrovniach.
short.sl: V tej akcijski igri, Pobeg zapora, ne da bi dobili ujeli policaji v zahtevnih ravneh.
short.sv: I det här actionspelet flyr du från fängelset utan att fastna av polisen på utmanande nivåer.
short.sw: Katika mchezo huu wa vitendo, Toroka gerezani bila kukamatwa na askari katika viwango vya changamoto.
short.ta: இந்த அதிரடி விளையாட்டில், சவாலான மட்டங்களில் போலீசாரால் பிடிபடாமல் சிறையிலிருந்து தப்பிக்கவும்.
short.te: ఈ యాక్షన్ గేమ్ లో, ఛాలెంజింగ్ లెవల్స్ లో పోలీసులకు చిక్కకుండా జైలు నుంచి తప్పించుకోండి.
short.th: ในเกมแอคชั่นนี้ Escape the prison โดยไม่ถูกตํารวจจับได้ในระดับที่ท้าทาย
short.tr: Bu aksiyon oyununda, zorlu seviyelerde polisler tarafından yakalanmadan hapishaneden kaçın.
short.uk: У цій екшн-грі втеча з в'язниці, не потрапивши до копів на складних рівнях.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Escape Masters, a unique escape experience that will lock you up with adrenaline-filled moments. This game is not an ordinary escape game. You will implement an escape plan, step by step, that you will carry out with your survival instincts, using your intelligence and challenging your reflexes. In the game, you aim to reach an ice cream cart behind the prison walls for your freedom. But this journey will be more challenging than you think.

Initially, you will proceed alone, digging the ground with just a simple tool. However, as you progress, the game's difficulty level will increase. You will need to make new friends and help them escape, too. Each story is full of obstacles of different difficulty. Although each path you dig takes you one step closer to freedom, you must be careful because a wrong decision can sentence you to a lifetime in prison.

In Escape Masters, you must not only use your escape skills but also your strategic thinking abilities. Which path you will choose, which obstacle you will overcome, or which friend you will help will be decisions that directly affect the course of the game.

Among the Escape games, this game also includes action and platform game features. In this way, it offers gamers a fully comprehensive experience.

If you want to experience a true escape, Escape Masters is for you. Get your pickaxe now, set your strategy, and fight for your freedom. Every second, every step will give you back your space.

How To Play
It is played with the mouse.

Escape Masters Action Game Features
✓ 10+ Level
✓ Easy use control
✓ Cartoon Graphics
✓ Quality Particle

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Escape Masters Action Game extension does not contain any hidden ads. In this way, you can fully experience the game and have a pleasant time. This game with great graphics has been designed for you with every detail in mind.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@pickergame.com and share your thoughts and problems.
